haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry

Class PeriodicEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.ScriptEntry
      • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.PeriodicEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scriptable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scriptable>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class PeriodicEntry
extends ScriptEntry
    The PeriodicEntry class extends the ScriptEntry class. The PeriodicEntry class offers functionalities for periodic Events.
    Author:
    Andreas Basener
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • period

        protected int period
        Time between two messages.

      • repeats

        protected int repeats
        Indicates how often the PriodicEntry generates a new EntryEvent.
        A value of 0 means infinite repetitions.

        private int count
        Indicates how often the PeriodicEntry had already generated a new EntryEvent.
